title: Bi Kun
data: Bi Kun (Chinese: 毕焜, born 12 November 1995) is a Chinese professional windsurfer. He represented China at the 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo competing in Men's RS:X where he won a bronze medal.[1][2] This biographical article related to sailing in China is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This windsurfing related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
